article.Heading: ITC can manage excise hike with 6-7% price rise: Edelweiss Sec
article.Summary: Abneesh Roy, Associate Director of Edelweiss Securities says that the 10 percent hike in excise duty on cigarette is manageable for ITC with a rise in price by 6-7 percent.
article.Body:
Abneesh Roy, Associate Director of Edelweiss Securities says that the 10 percent hike in excise duty on cigarette is manageable for ITC with a rise in price by 6-7 percent.

“The 8-10 percent hike is manageable for ITC,” he says. Edelweiss remains bullish on the company in long-run.

Roy says the volume growth for the company will be lower than last two years, which was around 9-10 percent. ITC will see volume decline lower single digits this time around, he adds.

ITC will also benefit in its other businesses like hotel and agriculture, he says. The company’s FMCG noodles business has 33 percent market share, and is expected to grow further, he adds.

For entire interview, watch accompanying video.
